overview: A tale of hidden secrets and red hot revelations is in store as director Ricky Wrecker draws us into this all-American sextravaganza. With a lustrous line-up, Rebeca Linares, Brooke Banner, Alexis Love, Kimberly Kane, Asia, and Jenni Lee take us through 6 steamy sex scenes where anal sex abounds and the plot unfolds amid frenzied fucking until all is revealed!
title: Revelations
